summary: Completed testing of case-type specific custom fields functionality. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate for all case types (Fly Tipping, Abandoned Vehicle, Littering, Dog Fouling, PSPO). Critical frontend issue found: case-type specific fields not rendering in UI despite backend support.

ui_bugs.issue: Case-type specific fields not appearing when case type is selected in Create Case dialog - CaseTypeFields component not rendering
Case-type specific fields not appearing when case type is selected in Public Report form - conditional rendering not working
ui_bugs.selector: text='Fly Tipping Details', text='Abandoned Vehicle Details'

ui_bugs.issue: No cases displaying on Cases page (shows 0 cases found) despite backend having cases - possible filtering or data loading issue

integration_issues.flow: Case type selection to field rendering
integration_issues.issue: CaseTypeFields component not being rendered when case type changes in both Create Case and Public Report forms

passed_tests: Backend login for all roles (manager, supervisor, officer)
Backend case creation with type-specific fields for all case types
Backend case retrieval with type-specific fields
Backend case update with type-specific fields
Backend public report submission with type-specific fields
Backend API endpoints for Fly Tipping, Abandoned Vehicle, Littering, Dog Fouling, PSPO
Frontend login and navigation to Cases page
Frontend Public Report page loading and case type dropdown
Frontend basic case information form fields
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix CaseTypeFields component rendering issue. The component is not appearing when case types are selected in both Create Case dialog and Public Report form. Backend fully supports case-type specific fields but frontend conditional rendering is broken. Also investigate Cases page showing 0 cases despite backend having data.
